question: Who will be honoured with the 'Hero to Animals Award 2018' from People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA) India?
explanation: Assamese Singer Zubeen Garg will be honoured with the \'Hero to Animals Award\' from People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA) India for his recent appeal to end animal sacrifice at the Kamakhya Temple in Assam. Zubeen had expressed his anguish over the ritual of animal sacrifice and appealed for putting an end to the practice while performing at a Bihu function near the temple recently. The priests of the Kamakhya Temple had subsequently criticised Zubeen for his statement and demanded an apology from him at the earliest.
